title: The Fresh Market
summary: The Fresh Market is served by an Express app that renders React and Redux. The back end is written in Java using Spring Boot and Eureka.

title: Fleischmann's Yeast
summary: Fleischmann's Yeast is built with WordPress and is hosted on AWS's Elastic Beanstalk. It uses a custom recipe plugin to categorize and facet over 800 recipes.

title: Pfaff Creative Icon 2
summary: Pfaff Creative Icon 2 landing page is built using React.js and a Node/Express backend. It features a signup form that auto populates dealers near your location using either geolocation or zip code.

title: Karo Syrup
summary: Karo Syrup is built with WordPress and is hosted on AWS's Elastic Beanstalk. It uses a custom recipe plugin to categorize and facet over 800 recipes.

title: Corona USA
summary: Main homepage for Corona USAâ„¢. Built using React.JS, Meteor, Scss and is hosted on Heroku. The site uses a custom Node/Express app to collect sweepstake entry data.

title: Upshot Agency
summary: Upshot.agency was a complete site rebuild using React.js and scss. It is hosted using a static build on AWS's Elastic Beanstalk.

title: Mazola Turkey Frying
summary: Mazola Turkey Frying is a React.Js app built for Mazola Corn Oil. It utilizes Scss styling and React's useful modal package and is hosted on Heroku.

title: Smithfield Nascar
summary: Smithfield Nascar is a sweepstakes site that was built using React, Redux, Exprexx, and a MongoDB backend.

title: Edge Marketing
summary: Edge Marketing was a complete site rebuild using HubSpot

title: Packers Bacon Sweepstakes
summary: Packers Bacon Sweeps is a site built for Patrick Cudahy Bacon. It is built in React.js and utilizes formik.js for its form validation. The entryform is validated by Google Recaptcha and saved in a Mongo Database via Compose.io.

title: Pacifico Preserves
summary: Pacifico Preserves is a single page React.JS app built using React and Scss and is hosted on Heroku.
